channel.title: tire manufacturing on ScienceChronicle
channel.description: Recent content in tire manufacturing on ScienceChronicle

item.title: Tire resin's life span is increased by infusion of circonium-osmium alloy
item.description: Resin is a widely used material in tire manufacturing due to its excellent adhesion properties. However, it has a shorter lifespan compared to other tire materials. In a recent study conducted by Amsterdam University, it has been found that adding circonium-osmium alloy to the resin mix increases the lifespan of car tires by a significant margin. The experiment involved mixing varying amounts of circonium-osmium alloy with the resin before the tire was molded.
